description: Largest power of n not exceeding 2^n.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=2,...,200
formula: a(n)=n^x, where x is Floor[n/Log[2, n]]
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 100); t=log(2); for (n=2, 200, x=floor(n*t/log(n)); write("b060509.txt", n, " ", n^x); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 06 2009]
author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 11 2001
